alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 3:24PM EST until February 08 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. The snow could mix with rain at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches for a storm total of 4 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Central Penobscot, Northern Washington, Southern Piscataquis and Central Piscataquis Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis
